verses.roman:
hena-kāle dolāya caḍi' rāmānanda rāya
snāna karibāre āilā, bājanā bājāya

synonyms: hena-kāle—at this time; dolāya caḍi'-riding on a palanquin; rāmānanda rāya—Śrīla Rāmānanda Rāya; snāna—bath; karibāre—to take; āilā—came there; bājanā bājāya—accompanied by a musical band.
translation: At that time, accompanied by the sounds of music, Rāmānanda Rāya came there on a palanquin to take his bath.
